MemoryInfobox.description: 'Barnabas's Adrestia|ship has seen better days, but Kassandra quickly learned how to make it formidable once more.'

General_Description: '''Learning the Ropes''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: As her first mission as the captain of the ''[[Adrestia]]'', Kassandra was asked by [[Barnabas]] to retrieve cargo stolen by the [[Cyclops of Kephallonia|Cyclops]]' mem.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Nothing like a sea breeze!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Does the deck always feel like it's moving?''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''I've got the perfect opportunity for you to get your sea legs.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Oh, what would that be?''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Well, when the Cyclops was giving me a drumming, his pirates took my cargo. I know their ship, and I know where they're heading. What say we get it back?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sure. It'll be a good opportunity to see how your ship and crew perform.''
Kassandra took command of the ship while Barnabas issued orders to his men.
*'''Barnabas:''' ''All right there, let's get moving! Let's see how the sails have held up.''
[[File:ACOD Learning the Ropes 1.png|thumb|250px|The ''Adrestia'' destroying the bandit ship]]
In little time, the ''Adrestia'' caught up to the pirate ship holding Barnabas's goods. A fight ensued.
*'''Barnabas:''' ''There she is!''
With the pirate ship damaged, Barnabas suggested a ramming maneuver.
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Ram them from the side, and cleave that ship in two!''
